questions.question: James as well as his friends ………………………….. guilty.
questions.description: When you connect two subjects with as well as, the verb agrees with the first subject.

questions.question: Neither Martha nor Jennifer ……………………….. there.
questions.description: When we connect two nouns with neither/nor, the verb agrees with the number and person of the second subject.

questions.question: One of the students ……………………………. missing.
questions.description: Use a singular verb after one of.

questions.question: Neither of them ……………………………. hard.
questions.description: Use a singular verb after either and neither.

questions.question: Either you or he …………………………… telling a lie.
questions.description: When we connect two nouns with either/or, the verb agrees with the number and person of the second subject.

questions.question: He …………………………… smoke.
questions.description: We use used to to talk about past habits.

questions.question: I …………………………. him to go.
questions.description: Before a personal object, we use tell.
